Name: April Fool
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and skewered Fragata Green Olive .
Express lemon zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: To quote Karen Fick, one of the Discerning Drinkers on hand when this 'cocktail' was created, "you can't beat a glass of water". Hence we have foolishly scored this drink 5+ out-of-five.
Nutrition: One serving of April Fool contains 0 calories
